name: subtle-tab
description: A new tab firefox addon and chrome extension
author: Akansh Gulati

scripts.build: npm run copy && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.prod: npm run copy && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.watch: npm run symlinks && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev webpack --progress --colors --hide-modules --watch
scripts.browser: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -p [ vueify/plugins/extract-css -o firefox/build.css ] -e src/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > firefox/build.js
